definitions.example: We felt a quake in the apartment every time the train went by.

definitions.definition: An earthquake, a trembling of the ground with force.
definitions.example: California is plagued by quakes; there are a few minor ones almost every month.
I felt the ground quaking beneath my feet.

definitions.definition: To be in a state of fear, shock, amazement, etc., such as might cause one to tremble.
